{"id":718587387,"lang":"java","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1654833054,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/718587387/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n        if (s.length()==0) return 0;\n        HashMap<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<Character, Integer>();\n        int max=0;\n        for (int i=0, j=0; i<s.length(); ++i){\n            if (map.containsKey(s.charAt(i))){\n                j = Math.max(j,map.get(s.charAt(i))+1);\n            }\n            map.put(s.charAt(i),i);\n            max = Math.max(max,i-j+1);\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
